text: Pradip Purohit is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Odisha Legislative Assembly from Padampur in the 2014 Odisha Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party.My NetaBJP leaders meet, discuss Odisha's Bijepur, Patkura by-poll strategyFight to be tight in Padampur ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Odisha Legislative Assembly Category:People from Bargarh district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Odisha Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Sambalpuri people
title: Pradip Purohit
